testcase.name: Verify the Report page for LTV REporting
Verify the Default Aggregate columns in Campaign Reporting
testcase.summary: Default Aggregate Columns to add (campaign, creative, advanced publisher, advanced creative, advanced geo):

step.expectedresults:
Below should be added as the default aggregate columns to the Campaign Reporting

1. D1 Retention
2. D3 Retention
3. D7 Retention
4. D1 Revenue
5. D3 Revenue
6. D7 Revenue
7. D1 ROAS
8. D3 ROAS
9. D7 ROAS

testcase.name: Verify the Default Aggregate columns in Creative Reporting

step.actions:
• Login to Grow
  • Navigate to Reports Page
step.expectedresults: • User should be on the Reports Page

step.actions: • Click on Creative link to view the Creative Report
step.expectedresults:
• Creative data should be displayed with the following default aggregate columns
  • . D1 Retention
    2. D3 Retention
    3. D7 Retention
    4. D1 Revenue
    5. D3 Revenue
    6. D7 Revenue
    7. D1 ROAS
    8. D3 ROAS
    9. D7 ROAS

testcase.name: Verify the Default Aggregate columns in Advanced Campaign Reporting
testcase.summary: Default Aggregate columns in Advanced Campaign Reporting

step.actions:
• Login to Grow
  • Navigate to Reports Page
step.expectedresults: • User should be on the Reports Page
User should be on the campaign reporting page

step.actions: Navigate to the end of the row of the CAmpaign for which you want to see the advance reporting and click on vertival ellipses
step.expectedresults: Vertical ellipses should be available and user should be directed to the Advanced Campaign Reporting Page

Following default aggregate columns should be displayed

  • . D1 Retention
    2. D3 Retention
    3. D7 Retention
    4. D1 Revenue
    5. D3 Revenue
    6. D7 Revenue
    7. D1 ROAS
    8. D3 ROAS
    9. D7 ROAS

testcase.name: he Default Verify the Aggregate columns in Advanced Creative Reporting
testcase.summary: Verify the Aggregate columns in Advanced Creative Reporting

step.actions:
• Login to Grow
  • Navigate to Reports Page
step.expectedresults: • User should be on the Reports Page

step.actions: Navigate to Creative Reporting Page by clickingthe Creative link next to the Campaign
step.expectedresults: User should be on the cReative Reporting Page

step.actions: Navigate to the end of the row of the Creative for which you want to see the advance reporting and click on vertival ellipses
step.expectedresults: Vertical ellipses should be available and user should be directed to the Advanced Creative Reporting Page

step.actions: Verify the Aggregate Columns of the Creative
step.expectedresults:
Following default aggregate columns should be displayed

  • . D1 Retention
    2. D3 Retention
    3. D7 Retention
    4. D1 Revenue
    5. D3 Revenue
    6. D7 Revenue
    7. D1 ROAS
    8. D3 ROAS
    9. D7 ROAS

testcase.name: Verify that the column sorting feature works properly
testcase.summary: Verify that the column sorting feature works properly

step.actions:
Verify the sorting funtinality by 

  • Clicking on the column name to sort from highest to lowest and lowest to highest

testcase.name: Verify the extra aggregate columns of the CampaignReport

step.actions:
Verify the extra columns of the Campaign Report by

  • Login to Grow-->Reports
step.expectedresults: User must be on the reports page and must be on the Campaign Reporting Page

step.actions: Check for the extra columns by clicking the gear icon at the end of the columns
step.expectedresults:
Following extra aggregate columns should be available

D1 Active Users
2. D3 Active Users
3. D7 Active Users
4. D14 Active Users
5. D15 Active Users
6. D30 Active Users
7. D14 Retention
8. D15 Retention
9. D30 Retention
10. D1 Paying Users
11. D3 Paying Users
12. D7 Paying Users
13. D14 Paying Users
14. D15 Paying Users
15. D30 Paying Users
16. D14 Revenue
17. D15 Revenue
18. D30 Revenue
19. D14 ROAS
20. D15 ROAS
21. D30 ROAS
